item.title: Litter and Rubbish causing problem for the childrensas well as adultsand due to which residence are facing pest issue, 29th October
item.description:
There is rubish on the street and near the start of the stairs due to which it is difficult for children to walk through and resident are not even able to take toddlers down. It is a life treating situation for children as there is danger of them falling down and creating pest issue.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Springfield Road, Welling, London

item.title: Wet Leaves and Litter, 29th October
item.description:
Both sides of Sutherland Road. Edmonton N9 are covered in leaves and litter which are very wet and slippery due to the recent rainfall. Please can we get street cleaning team to clear as there is a potential hazard for anyone walking across this and having accident. Pavements are completely covered.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 26, Sutherland Road, Edmonton, London
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crouch Croft, Coldharbour, London

item.title: Pedestrian lane to Heysham Lane, 28th October
item.description:
Chronic problem with lights out - reported a month ago by another person as #8255692. Urgent safety issue, both trip and fall as well as crime - three days ago a street robbery occurred in the dark a few hundred yards away on Redington Road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Redington Gardens, West Hampstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet
